list.name: Default
list.comment: Have made a number of changes. Added validation, including for FontProperties parameters, and removed font_name parameters from make_logo in favor of just using font_family parameters.

task.summary: Default task
Major revision, including working Logo() class
Deleted derived classes of Logo
Changed a lot of stuff, including font handling and anylogo -> logomaker
Implemented much better character transformation algorithm.
Added logomaker_type tag to dataframes returned by logomaker, as well as ability to read this type in Logo() and transform_mat
Had forgotten to add logomaker.py and the ipython notebooks. Fixed.

[x] Create ipython notebook to show off all the kinds of logos. [x] Get count_logo working [x] Refactor logo types to ‘counts’,’probability’,’enrichment’,’energy’,’information' [x] Remove utils.py [x] Write make_logo; move functionality out of Logo class constructor
Implemented sequence highlighting within logos
Divided padding by 2, so that value is now equal to total whitespace
Implemented character transformations
Moved patch computation to character constructor, out of draw() function
Included ability to read parameters_file into make_logo, but I think this was a bad idea.
created make_style_logo and simplified both make_logo and Logo.__init__()
test commit
fixed load_parameters() to use re and accept multi-line input.
Created 'vlines' axis format. Implemented xtick_spacing and xtick_anchor also.
Minor changes.
Added sortseq_test.ipynb
Fixed bug associated with position restriction in make_logo()
Just doing update.
Added all files in root folder
Made lots of changes over the weekend.
Implemented sequence_type and rcparams arguments. Wrote data.filter_columns.
Fixed bugs in character filtering, i.e., use of the parameters sequence_type, characters, and ignore_characters
Added splicesite_test.ipynb
I'm stepping away for a while now.
I made some changes.
Added 2 ipython notebooks.
Did lots of refactoring of functionality in Logo.__init__ into make_logo
Lots of changes.
Made changes to test_crpbindingsites.ipynb
Added some data files.
Split code into files Logo.py, make_logo.py, make_styled_logo.py, and worked on the make_logo docstring.
Finished initial documentation for make_styled_logo, except the description of the 'background' parameter.
Made baseline specification more flexible.
Removed trailing commas from style file paring.
Have made a number of changes. Added validation, including for FontProperties parameters, and removed font_name parameters from make_logo in favor of just using font_family parameters.
